Commit: Updated docs with prototype section and README.md with updated progress docs link

**Date**: 2025-03-23

Description
-----------
This commit finalizes the documentation updates by adding a prototype section and updating the documentation links in the README.md. The changes make the documentation more accessible to users by:
- Adding a dedicated prototype section to document the development progress
- Updating the README.md file with the correct GitHub Pages URL for the project documentation
- Replacing the placeholder repository link with the actual deployed documentation site
- Ensuring that users can access the latest documentation through the GitHub Pages interface
